DOC.brief_summary: Tohe purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence of a fentanyl patch transdermal delivery system.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Fentanyl Patch
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on physical exam, medical history or clinical laboratory tests on screening. Negative test for HIV and hepatitis B and C No history of drug or alcohol treatment No allergies to opiates
